heading.bio: Hi, I’m Luca, an Italian Fullstack Developer specialized in React, Typescript, Swift, and Python. I enjoy writing clean and maintainable code and staying up to date with the latest technology standards and best practices. I'm very passionate about programming, web graphics, and Cloud Computing

iregistro_website.name: React App Showcase Website
iregistro_website.description: React Website to showcase my app made in React with the NextJs Framework and Tailwind CSS

iregistro.name: Fullstack iOS App
iregistro.description: Swift native iOS app with custom Python Flask API that scrapes data from schools websites and helps students staying up to date

ping4gitlab.name: Gitlab Mobile App for Notifications
ping4gitlab.description: Multiplatform app that leverages giltab mail notifications to send users instant push notifications about their and their team activities on gitlab

polimi.name: Computer Engineering
polimi.description: Currently studying “Computer Engineering” in the Cremona branch of the Politecnico di Milano

itis.name: Computer Expert
itis.description: Obtained the qualification of “Computer Expert” at the IIS Janello Torriani in Cremona with a grade of 100 and honors
